meaningMnemonic: You <radical>say</radical> you've left some <radical>grain</radical> on the <radical>stairs</radical>. This is how you <kanji>invite</kanji> people into your place.
readingMnemonic: You've <kanji>invite</kanji>d people in by leaving grain on the stairs but some <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう) have ended up eating all the grain.
